description.english: Defeat a normal enemy with 1 HP left.
Defeat an elite enemy with 1 HP left.
Defeat a boss with 1 HP left.
Win a fight without using any Gear Cards.
description.schinese: 不使用装备牌赢得一场战斗。
description.tchinese: 不使用裝備牌贏得一場戰鬥。

description.english: Win a fight without using any Attack Cards.
description.schinese: 不使用攻击牌赢得一场战斗。
description.tchinese: 不使用攻擊牌贏得一場戰鬥。

description.english: Win a fight without using any Skill Cards.
description.schinese: 不使用技能牌赢得一场战斗。
description.tchinese: 不使用技能牌贏得一場戰鬥。

description.english: Slay a normal enemy without losing any HP.
Slay an elite enemy without losing any HP.
Slay a boss without losing any HP.
Inflict 50+ damage with a single blow.
Inflict 99+ damage with a single blow.
Have a Max HP of 150+.
Have a Max HP of 200+.
Defeat a enemy squad without taking any damage.
description.schinese: 不受任何伤害战胜普通怪物组合。
description.tchinese: 不受任何傷害戰勝普通怪物組合。

description.english: Defeat an elite enemy squad without taking any damage.
description.schinese: 不受任何伤害战胜精英怪物组合。
description.tchinese: 不受任何傷害戰勝精英怪物組合。

description.english: Defeat a boss without taking any damage.
Use 5 Cards in a fight.
description.schinese: 在一次战斗中消耗5张牌。
description.tchinese: 在一次戰鬥中消耗5張牌。

description.english: Use 10 Cards in a fight.
description.schinese: 在一次战斗中消耗10张牌。
description.tchinese: 在一次戰鬥中消耗10張牌。

description.english: Use 20 Cards in a fight.
description.schinese: 在一次战斗中消耗20张牌。
description.tchinese: 在一次戰鬥中消耗20張牌。

description.english: Use 7 Cards in a single turn.
description.schinese: 一回合中使用不少于7张牌。
description.tchinese: 一回合中使用不少於7張牌。

description.english: Use 15 Cards in a single turn.
description.schinese: 一回合中使用不少于15张牌。
description.tchinese: 一回合中使用不少於15張牌。

description.english: Use 20 Cards in a single turn.
description.schinese: 一回合中使用不少于20张牌。
description.tchinese: 一回合中使用不少於20張牌。

description.english: Obtain an SSR Card through merging.
Obtain 5 SSR Cards through merging.
Obtain 10 SSR Cards through merging.
Complete your first Enchantment.
Complete 10 Enchantments.
Complete 100 Enchantments.
Find 100 Cards.
Find 200 Cards.
Find 300 Cards.
5 Side Quests completed.
10 Side Quests completed.
15 Side Quests completed.
Trigger 20 Traps.
Trigger 50 Traps.
Trigger 100 Traps.

displayName.english: True Ending not achieved yet - Mercenary

description.english: Clear all stages as a Mercenary.

displayName.english: True Ending not achieved yet - Sage

description.english: Clear all stages as a Sage.

displayName.english: True Ending not achieved yet - Noble

description.english: Clear all stages as a Noble.
Clear a stage with no N Cards in your Final Deck Build.
description.schinese: 通关卡组中不含N稀有度卡牌。
description.tchinese: 通關卡組中不含N稀有度卡牌。

description.english: Clear a stage with no R Cards in your Final Deck Build.
description.schinese: 通关卡组中不含R稀有度卡牌。
description.tchinese: 通關卡組中不含R稀有度卡牌。

description.english: Clear a stage with no SR Cards in your Final Deck Build.
description.schinese: 通关卡组中不含SR稀有度卡牌。
description.tchinese: 通關卡組中不含SR稀有度卡牌。

description.english: Clear a stage with no SSR Cards in your Final Deck Build.
description.schinese: 通关卡组中不含SSR稀有度卡牌。
description.tchinese: 通關卡組中不含SSR稀有度卡牌。

description.english: Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.
The Champion has traveled across Cyria.
The Champion has finally fulfilled her destiny.
description.schinese: 勇者最终完成了她的使命。
description.tchinese: 勇者最終完成了她的使命。

description.english: All bugs have been fixed and everything is working.
description.schinese: 所有错误已修复，程序运作正常。
description.tchinese: 所有錯誤已修復，程式運作正常。

description.english: The Champion has rewritten the prophecy.
description.schinese: 那位勇者改写了伟大预言。
description.tchinese: 那位勇者改寫了偉大預言。

description.english: Just show me the way to the Mercenary Tavern.
description.schinese: 你只要告诉我佣兵酒馆在哪里就行了。
description.tchinese: 你只要告訴我傭兵酒館在哪裏就行了。

description.english: I'd like an orientation, please.
description.schinese: 那就有劳你为我介绍一下这里了。
description.tchinese: 那就有勞你爲我介紹一下這裏了。

description.english: Nothing has changed... except me.
description.schinese: 仿佛改变了的只有我而已……
description.tchinese: 彷彿改變了的只有我而已……

description.english: Farewell, Odia...
Sorry, Viona...
What caused the conflict between the Rubrans and Sapphirans? And what will happen afterwards?
description.schinese: 红蓝家族的百年纷争因何而起？百年纷争之后的未来又是如何？
description.tchinese: 紅藍家族的百年紛爭因何而起？百年紛爭之後的未來又是如何？

description.english: Ineffable.
A worthy opponent.
Peace... at least for now.
description.schinese: 百年的纷争停息了……暂时。
description.tchinese: 百年的紛爭停息了……暫時。

description.english: Mutanian Hunter.
It will one day grow into the King of the Crypt Fiends.
description.schinese: 它终将成为地穴兽之王。
description.tchinese: 它終將成爲地穴獸之王。

description.english: You feel the conspiracy of the Nexians.
description.schinese: 你窥探到了圣子教巨大阴谋的一角。
description.tchinese: 你窺探到了聖子教巨大陰謀的一角。

description.english: Mebius, your savior is back.
description.schinese: 梅比乌斯，你的军师回来了。
description.tchinese: 梅比烏斯，你的軍師回來了。

description.english: Go to work now!
A witch lives deep within the forests of Helm. What lies beneath her mask?
description.schinese: 毒潭的深处居住着一位女巫，而她的真容……
description.tchinese: 毒潭的深處居住着一位女巫，而她的真容……

description.english: You forgot about someone.
A crisis is looming above Helm.
description.schinese: 赫尔姆将迎来一场危机。
description.tchinese: 赫爾姆將迎來一場危機。

description.english: The Mutanian Empress has been defeated by Arista.
The Mutanian Empress has been defeated by Sonohime.
The Mutanian Empress has been defeated by Freya.
description.schinese: 艾瑞芙兰雅战胜了魔王。
description.tchinese: 艾瑞芙兰雅战胜了魔王。

description.english: It's awesome.
The conflict lasted for centuries. Finally, it has come to an end.
description.schinese: 百年的纷争终于结束了。
description.tchinese: 百年的紛爭終於結束了。

description.english: What a mess!
Remorsia will break the seal one day.
description.schinese: 再一次将魔剑封印，魔剑也会再一次突破封印。
description.tchinese: 再一次將魔劍封印，魔劍也會再一次突破封印。

description.english: Now you know the truth... but the karma can never be broken.
description.schinese: 你知晓了真相，但无法打破这轮回。
description.tchinese: 你知曉了真相，但無法打破這輪迴。

description.english: Hold Hero's Saber and end Remorsia.
description.schinese: 手持英雄之剑给予魔剑终结。
description.tchinese: 手持英雄之剑给予魔剑终结。

description.english: All shall be purified.
Quest completed.
You find the truth.
Can you catch up with me?
You completed the quest. Well done!
description.schinese: 你完成了这次的委托，而且完成的还不错。
description.tchinese: 你完成了這次的委託，而且完成的還不錯。

description.english: You completed the quest perfectly.
description.schinese: 你完美的解决了这次的委托。
description.tchinese: 你完美的解決了這次的委託。

description.english: This medicine is specifically prepared for immediate aid.
The Church has opened its doors for you. Inside, there is endless darkness and insanity.
description.schinese: 教堂的大门已对你打开，那黑暗与疯狂在呼唤着你和她。
description.tchinese: 教堂的大門已對你打開，那黑暗與瘋狂在呼喚着你和她。

description.english: The Mutanian Empress has fallen... again?
description.schinese: 勇者再一次打败了魔王。恩？为什么是再一次？
description.tchinese: 勇者再一次打敗了魔王。恩？爲什麼是再一次？

description.english: This place will be both its empire and grave.
description.schinese: 这里曾是它的王国，也将是它的坟墓。
description.tchinese: 這裏曾是它的王國，也將是它的墳墓。

description.english: Crush over your enemies if you don't like them.
Everything in your life has a price.
description.schinese: 生命的恩惠终将以生命来偿还。
description.tchinese: 生命的恩惠終將以生命來償還。

description.english: Welcome to the fabulous beaches of Elizer.
You found it. Good job!
You found the dark secrets hidden beneath the beaches of Elizer.
description.schinese: 你发现了隐藏在艾丽泽海滨的阴暗。
description.tchinese: 你發現了隱藏在艾麗澤海濱的陰暗。

description.english: You found the insane secrets hidden beneath the beaches of Elizer.
description.schinese: 你发现了隐藏在艾丽泽海滨的疯狂。
description.tchinese: 你發現了隱藏在艾麗澤海濱的瘋狂。

description.english: Proceeding to another crypt…
description.schinese: 勇者即将前往一处深邃的地穴。
description.tchinese: 勇者即將前往一處深邃的地穴。

description.english: The Mutanian Empress has fallen for... what number time is this, exactly?
description.schinese: 勇者又一次打败了魔王。唔……这到底是第几次了？
description.tchinese: 勇者又一次打敗了魔王。唔……這到底是第幾次了？

description.english: A Demonlord who wants freedom.
She fancies herself a bohemian Mercenary.
The relentless pursuer of truth.
The Lord who shoulders responsibilities.
You are destined to beat the Mutanian Empress.
description.schinese: 现在的你只是一位要打倒魔王的勇者。
description.tchinese: 現在的你只是一位要打倒魔王的勇者。

description.english: You will find your real ego.

displayName.english: It is over before it even began.

description.english: Without the Champion, the world faces total annihilation.
description.schinese: 勇者没有出现，世界迎来了毁灭。
description.tchinese: 勇者沒有出現，世界迎來了毀滅。

description.english: What did Sonohime, the time traveler, see when visited those three worlds?
description.schinese: 世界的穿越者园姬，当她环游三大世界时，在她的眼中看到了什么？
description.tchinese: 世界的穿越者園姬，當她環游三大世界時，在她的眼中看到了什么？

description.english: What does the world's devastation have to do with me?
Clearance with 2 cards.
Clearance with 1 card.
Clearance with 0 card.
Win the battle and uncover the false reality
description.schinese: 揭开虚伪真实的战斗获得胜利
description.tchinese: 揭開虛僞真實的戰鬥獲得勝利

description.english: Win the battle and end the karma, but is it really over？
description.schinese: 结束轮回的最终一战获得胜利，但这一切真的结束了吗...
description.tchinese: 結束輪迴的最終一戰獲得勝利，但這一切真的結束了嗎...

description.english: Clear Epic Lv.39
Clear Epic Lv.59
Clear Epic Lv.79
Clear Epic Lv.99
Clear Epic Lv.119
